## RequiredKeys type

Get required property keys of T.

**Signature:**

```typescript
export type RequiredKeys<T> = Exclude<Keys<T>, OptionalKeys<T>>
```
**References:** [Keys](./types-kit.keys.md)<!-- -->, [OptionalKeys](./types-kit.optionalkeys.md)

## Example


```ts
interface Props {
    a?: number
    readonly b: number
    c?: number
  }

  // Expect: 'b'
  type PropKeys = OptionalKeys<Props>
```
